info.description:
## Introduction
HotelService API provides a method for Custom Hotel Source vendors to provide hotel inventory, rates and booking related functionality to users of Concur OBT (Online Booking Tool). 

Once the Hotel Supplier has developed and certified their API implementation with SAP Concur, their inventory will begin appearing in hotel searches by opted-in Travel users.
info.title: HotelService API

500.description: Error while processing the request. Request can be retried as is at a later time.

post.description: Read reservation details. Used in a process of reserving a hotel to acknowledge receipt of booking confirmation as well as write information to Itinerary. Not invoked by user, but by automatic Concur process. Hotel Supplier should reply with the same response as provided for the book response.

400.description: Invalid client request. Request shouldn't be retried without changing it.

500.description: Error while processing the request. Request can be retried as is at a later time.

BadRequest.description: Invalid client request. Request shouldn't be retried without changing it.

ProcessingError.description: Error while processing the request. Request can be retried as is at a later time.

SearchCriteria.description: Search by either location or exact property reference if already available

numGuests.description: No. of guests for accomodation as entered by traveler

guestCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO code (ISO ALPHA-2) for country

hotelPropertyRefs.description: Reference Ids to hotel properties if we already have them. When provided 'locationSearch'  will not be used and may not be set.

checkin.description: Check in date as entered by traveler

checkout.description: Check out date as entered by traveler

customFields.description: Custom fields that are supported by vendor (e.g. CostCenter)

includeDepositRequired.description: Whether to include properties where deposit is required or not

rateCategories.description: Special rate categories requested if applicable

maxSearchResults.description: Maximum number of properties allowed to be included in search results

LocationSearch.description: Reference to location details for search

hotelPropertyRefs.description: Reference Ids to hotel properties for which rate is requested

checkin.description: Check in date as entered by traveler

checkout.description: Check out date as entered by traveler

rateCategories.description: Special rate categories requested if applicable

guestCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO code (ISO ALPHA-2) for country

ratePlanIds.description: Rate Product Ids for which detail rates are requested

checkin.description: Check in date as entered by traveler

checkout.description: Check out date as entered by traveler

rateCategories.description: Special rate categories requested if applicable. Rate category is a value used to request a particular rate code if the guest qualifies for a special rate, such as AARP, AAA or a corporate rate. Uses RPT OTA code type.

numGuests.description: No. of guests for accomodation as entered by traveler

guestCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO code (ISO ALPHA-2) for country

hotelCodes.description: Reference Ids to hotel properties for which rate is requested

HotelPropertyRef.description: Reference to hotel property using provider specific property code

chainCode.description: Chain code associated with hotel if any

propertyCode.description: Provider's property code as given in search response

HotelProperty.description: Hotel property object returned by hotel search

chainCode.description: Chain code associated with hotel if any

HotelRating.description: Hotel rating details along with source

value.description: Hotel rating value should be an integer number from 1 to 5, representing its star rating.

CatalogName.description: Northstar, Giata and GDS (Sabre, Amadeus, Galileo) are preferred options at this time

cityCode.description: IATA 3 char city code for this property (required for adding passive segments)

category.description: OTA code describing the image as defined in OTA Picture Category Code (PIC) list

iataCode.description: IATA code of airport if location searched is of type Airport

LocationType.description: Type of location associated with this search

countryCode.description: Two-character ISO code (ISO ALPHA-2) for country

mealsIncluded.description: Code based on OTA Meal Plan Type (MPT) list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

roomType.description: OTA code of type GRI (Guest Room Info) providing guest room type details

otaCode.description: Code based on OTA Rate Plan Type (RPT) list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

value.description: Optional value for the given rate plan type code

TotalPrice.description: Details about total pricing associated with the stay

prepayRequired.description: Whether or not prepayment is required for booking this rate

isRefundable.description: Is this rate refundable or not (based on all cancel penalties)

penalties.description: Cancel penalties associated with the rate

NightlyPrice.description: Details about nightly price for a given date range

cancelDeadline.description: date string in the date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

description.example: Free cancellation up to 1 week before checkin

taxInclusive.description: If true, all taxes are included in the returned rate.

feesInclusive.description: If true, all fees are included in the returned rate.

numberOfNights.description: The number of nights that are to be spent in the property.

percent.description: The percentage used to calculate the amount of the cancel fee.

RequestorInfo.description: Information about POS (Point Of Sale), traveler and user associated with this request

posRequestorId.description: An identifier of the entity making the request (e.g. ATA/IATA/ID number)

travelerUuid.description: UUID that identifies the traveler within Concur

loginId.description: Login ID of traveler within Concur. Only sent when available.

bookingForSelf.description: Is logged in person booking for self or on behalf of someone else

Radius.description: Radius to restrict the search for hotels. 'maxRadius' allows extending search radius for preferred hotel properties and can be more than radius defined by traveler

SearchSessionToken.description: Session token to be generated and provided by server on initial "search" call that can be referenced back for future api calls on the same session.

otaCode.description: Code based on OTA Additional Detail Type (ADT) list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

startDate.description: Start date for descriptive info if applicable only for specific dates (e.g. for alerts or special events)

endDate.description: End date for descriptive info if applicable only for specific dates (e.g. for alerts or special events)

comments.description: Comments about special requests for this booking

customFields.description: Vendor specific fields if setup for vendor integration

comments.description: Comments about special requests for this booking

ConfirmationCodeType.description: Confirmation Code Types that maps to OTA codes for Unique Id Types list RESERVATION(Record Locator)=14, SUPPLIER_CONFIRMATION=40, CANCELLATION=50, MODIFICATION=1000, HOTEL_CONFIRMATION(Property Confirmation No.)=10, CONCUR_GDS_REFERENCE -> Concur Booking Record Locator for Passives

LeadRate.description: Lead rate is the lowest nightly rate averaged over the stay, before taxes and fees

HotelAmenity.description: Hotel amenity containing code as described in OTA code list Hotel Amenity Code (HAC)

RoomAmenity.description: Room amenity containing code as described in OTA code list Room Amenity Type (RMA)

Error.description: Error with OTA code and description

otaCode.description: Code based on OTA Error Codes list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

Bedding.description: Details about bedding associated with the room

bedTypeCode.description: Code based on OTA Bed Type (BED) list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

Taxes.description: Representation of nightly tax amount associated with a rate along with optional breakdown.

Fees.description: Representation of nightly fees associated with a rate for given dates along with optional breakdown.

FeeTaxType.description: Fee or Tax associated with rate - can be either included or excluded from total rate as marked with 'inclusive' field.

fttCode.description: Code based on OTA's Fee Tax Type (FTT) list (https://www.opentraveldevelopersnetwork.com/code-list)

inclusive.description: Whether or not this tax/fee is included in totalAmountAfterTax amount.

SustainabilityAward.description: Award/Certification related to sustainability awarded to the hotel

label.description: Name or label of the award/certification

LegalEntity.description: Provides details about the legal entity associated with this booking if available

taxId.description: Tax identity of the legal entity

ThreeDSecure.description: 3D Secure Strong Customer Authentication payment verification parameters

avv.description: For 3DS1, this is the CAVV. For 3DS2, this is the AVV.

cavvAlgorithm.description: Identifies the algorithm used to generate the CAVV for 3DS1.

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier assigned by the 3DS Server to identify a single transaction.

threeDSServerTransactionID.description: For 3DS1, this identifies the XID. For 3DS2, this identifies the dsTransactionID.

HotelRate_source.description: Details about source attributed to this rate. Please note that logo is given preference to name and nothing is displayed as source if suppress is true

name.description: Name of the supplier for this source that can be shown in UI (Logo is given higher preference)

logo.description: Logo of the supplier for this source that can be shown in UI

suppress.description: If true, will suppress all source attributions for this rate

propertyDescription.example: Offering a restaurant and a fitness centre, Hilton Garden Inn Long Island City is located in Long Island City. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a TV. Complete with a microwave, the dining area also has a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Guests will enjoy a full service restaurant and bar with evening room service. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. LaGuardia Airport is 8 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19). Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result. Please note that the Extra Bed / Crib is subject to availability. The property will be under renovations to the lobby bar and lounge area from 6 January 2020 until 30 March 2020.

cvv.description: Card Verification Value - three or four-digit number on credit card for security
